ygData.subject: Re: Is this list still up?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I just found out there was a list about amonth ago and this thread is the first one i have received so I ll introduce myself. I just got 47 with
ygData.messageBody:
Well I just found out there was a list about amonth ago and this thread is
the first one i have received so I'll introduce myself.

I just got 47 with Squiggles, My Troll SK on Vallon Zek. I am the leader of
<Da Bashin' Iggles>. My guild and our allies are preparing for a dragon
raid in a month at the max. Tried Fire Giants for the first time on
Saturday night, did ok on the first 3, but got massacred after that. Anyone
got any tips on FG's, dragons, or breaking into the Planes? Pulling
locations for FG's would be most beneficial at this time.

Let me remind you that this is Race War PvP server so we are an al evil
team guild, as are our allies. So we don't have bards or monks.

thanks in advance,

Squiggles Jiggles
lvl 47 TSK
leader of Da Bashin' Iggles

www.ciab.net/iggles
